name: American Football Players Photo Scratch Games Pro
name_original: American Football Players Photo Scratch Games Pro
description:
Test your brain! Scratch & Reveal the pictures images & Guess that name!!! If less percent that you scratch, the bonus point that more multiplies.

Features:
- For Pro version, You will receive bonus coins for 500 more than Free Version.
- Helpful hints for guessing the Characters & Object.
- Asking for help with your FB friends
- Ask for more help via Twitter, Mail, etc
